project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Create a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement calculation of mean for user-specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for user-specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for user-specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
